post.description: Creates new chat for RAG system.
Cancel processing of query (all dependant jobs) by id.

get.description: Returns chat with messages within it.

post.description: Creates new domain (group of sources used for RAG vector search).

get.description: List domains to which user has access.
Returns list of roles permitted to domain.

put.description: Updates list of roles permitted to domain.

get.description: Returns list of users permitted to domain.

put.description: Updates list of users permitted to domain.

post.description: Creates new scenario (options used for RAG vector search).
Creates new source used for RAG vector search.

get.description: List sources to which user has access.
Returns list of roles permitted to source.

put.description: Updates list of roles permitted to source.

get.description: Returns list of users permitted to source.

put.description: Updates list of users permitted to source.

get.description: Returns information about source and its update parameters.

put.description: Update source information or params for update job.

queryModelName.description: Пока не знаю нучно ли будет

topN.description: Сколько чанков забирать при векторном поиске.
Сколько чанков забирать при векторном поиске.

nanos.description:
Non-negative fractions of a second at nanosecond resolution. Negative
second values with fractions must still have non-negative nanos values
that count forward in time. Must be from 0 to 999,999,999
inclusive.

seconds.description:
Represents seconds of UTC time since Unix epoch
1970-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must be from 0001-01-01T00:00:00Z to
9999-12-31T23:59:59Z inclusive.
